name: Spa Atlantis
description: Spa Atlantis is Reno's only Forbes Travel Guide Four-Star Spa — a destination unlike any other in the city. A refuge from the everyday world, professionally trained aestheticians and massage therapists provide world-class treatments surrounded by calm healing colors, natural stone, and the gentle flow of water. Six consecutive Forbes Four-Star awards make it the pinnacle of spa excellence in Northern Nevada.
shortDescription: Reno's only Forbes Travel Guide Four-Star Spa — 6 consecutive years of excellence at the Atlantis.

faqs.question: What makes Spa Atlantis special?
faqs.answer: It's Reno's only Forbes Travel Guide Four-Star Spa, with 6 consecutive award years — the highest spa rating in Northern Nevada.

faqs.question: Can Golf the High Sierra include spa treatments in a package?
faqs.answer: Yes — we can build packages combining tee times, lodging, and Spa Atlantis treatments for groups and couples.

testimonials.quote: Spa Atlantis is world-class. We added spa treatments to our golf package through GTHS and it was the highlight of the trip for half our group.
testimonials.author: Sandra K.

testimonials.quote: Six Forbes Four-Star awards says it all. The massage therapists are exceptional and the atmosphere is genuinely peaceful.
testimonials.author: David M.
